CatDescriptText: Mr. Charles Lewis, Lombard Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1957, pg. 3 with question: "Do you think that the proposed six-day-a-week school attendance, as proposed by Governor Leader, is the answer to the Russian challenge in scientific education?" answer reads: "I think that it will be a good thing educationally, and help to keep the youngsters out of trouble, also."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Charles Lewis wearing U. S. mail postal delivery uniform, standing in front of brick building, with Amoco anti-freeze cans in window, and open door on right
